Package com.flag4j.io

Class TensorOutputStream

java.lang.Object
java.io.OutputStream
com.flag4j.io.TensorOutputStream
All Implemented Interfaces:
Closeable, Flushable, AutoCloseable
public class TensorOutputStream extends OutputStream
A class for writing tensors to a file in various formats.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    TensorOutputStream​(String fileName)
    Creates TensorOutputStream which will use an ObjectOutputStream to write serialized data to a FileOutputStream which will in-turn write the serialized data to a file.

  • Constructor Details

    • TensorOutputStream

      public TensorOutputStream​(String fileName) throws IOException
      Creates TensorOutputStream which will use an ObjectOutputStream to write serialized data to a FileOutputStream which will in-turn write the serialized data to a file.
      Parameters:
      fileName - File name, including extension, of file to write data to.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs while reading the stream header.

  • Method Details

    • write

      public void write​(TensorBase<?> A) throws IOException
      Writes a TensorBase object to a file by serializing the object.
      Parameters:
      A - Object to write to file. This may be a real/complex dense or sparse tensor, matrix, or vector.
      Throws:
      IOException

    • write

      public void write​(int b) throws IOException
      Writes a bite to the output stream. This method will forward the write to ObjectOutputStream.write(int).
      Specified by:
      write in class OutputStream
      Parameters:
      b - the byte.
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs. In particular, an IOException may be thrown if the output stream has been closed.

    • close

      public void close() throws IOException
      Closes the stream. This method must be called to release any resources associated with the stream.
      Specified by:
      close in interface AutoCloseable
      Specified by:
      close in interface Closeable
      Overrides:
      close in class OutputStream
      Throws:
      IOException - If an I/O exception has occurred.
